description:
JUNE 2016 UPDATE

Join over 2,800 successful students and take this course! Get your app on the Top Charts!

"The instructor is presenting the topic in a science-like manner, very detailed and data-oriented."

Do you have an app available on the App Store or Google Play? Are you frustrated with getting little or no downloads to your app?

What if it got a whole lot easier to get your app visible and start seeing lots more downloads?

Now imagine your app was getting 1000's or even 10000's of downloads every day.

How would that make you feel?

This course will teach you how to get more downloads for your app and reach Top 100 app rankings, all with minimal effort.

By creating an app that grows without advertising, you'll find yourself making money on app knowledge that you already have.

You'll tackle everything, from keyword research basics to growing your app in international markets, so you'll be able to create a hugely successful app from scratch or enhance an existing one.

Make Your App Highly Visible and Get Tons of Downloads

  • Identify a highly profitable app niche
  • Design a better app than your competitors
  • Create the best-performing app title and keywords
  • Learn what it takes to reach Top 100 rankings
  • Know the techniques of high-quality app localization
  • Utilize the differences between App Store and Google Play marketplace
  • Keep your app ranking and revenue consistent

Save Yourself Time by Knowing What Works on the App Store

This course will show you what it takes to be a truly successful app publisher.

You'll cover the ins and outs of getting your app visible on the App Store, so you'll understand what it takes to reach high number of downloads and top rankings.

With the tools and strategies you'll learn, you'll be able to save time and effort so you can generate a passive income from one or more profitable apps.

Contents and Overview

Throughout this course, you'll acquire the secrets to generating more downloads for your apps on the App Store every day.

You'll begin by tackling how to identify an app niche which is underserved (low competition) and very profitable (highly popular) so your app has great chances of getting tons of downloads.

Understanding dynamics of the App Store is key to growing your app traffic, so you'll learn how app ranking, download numbers, and app reviews are interrelated and how to use this to your advantage.

Long Tail Keywords are extremely important in getting your app visible on the App Store, so you'll be shown how to perform premiere keyword research.

You'll tackle how to form an attention-grabbing title and high ranking keywords for your app so your app will attract the highest number of users possible.

After launching your app, you'll need to monitor it in order to continue getting downloads and earning profits, so you'll also learn how to track the performance of your keywords and when to update them.

You'll tackle how to keep your app up-to-date by enhancing its keywords and adding new features, so you utilize the secret ranking weapon that a large majority of developers is unaware of.

Localizing your app to international markets can bring a significant boost to your download numbers, so you'll learn the secrets of effective app localization.

You'll even learn how to take advantage of hidden keyword fields on the App Store so you maximize the reach of your app.

ASO principles you'll learn here are largely the same on the App Store and Google Play, so you'll tackle smaller differences between the stores to know how to optimize your app.

By the end of this course, you'll know everything you need to grow your app download numbers and generate a higher income from your apps.

You'll be able to stand out against your competitors by publishing highly visible apps that tons of users will want to download, and you'll succeed in getting your apps into the Top 100 rankings.
title: How I Got 10 Million Downloads using App Store Optimization
